main event: A group of people observed a large, orange object in the sky over Painesville, Ohio for about 15 minutes before it disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as being large and orange in color., The report states that estimating the object's velocity was difficult., The object's course was undefined., There were no photographs or physical evidence of the sighting., Witnesses included individuals with backgrounds in railroad signaling.
witness description: A group of people, including a railroad telegrapher and others.
